properties.name: City Harvest Mobile Market, Melrose Houses
properties.notes: - Eligibility requirements: must be resident of the Melrose, Morrisania Air Rights, or Andrew Jackson Houses

properties.name: City Harvest Mobile Market, Queensbridge
properties.notes:
- Appointments are preferred, but not required
- ID is required, but there are no neighborhood restrictions
- Located in the basketball court directly behind the Jacob A. Riis Neighborhood Settlement House
- Mostly produce items

properties.name: City Harvest Mobile Market, Prince Hall Temple
City Harvest Mobile Market, Astoria Houses
properties.notes:
- No ID requirements for first time visitors
- May be some geographical restrictions, but first-time visitors are welcome
- Located on the basketball court off of Astoria Boulevard in the Astoria Houses
- bring shopping cart 
- Mostly produce items

properties.name: City Harvest Mobile Market, Mariner's Harbor
City Harvest Mobile Market, Washington Heights/Inwood
properties.address: Nagle Ave & 10th Ave on Dyckman St
properties.notes:
- Requirements: Resident of Manhattan
- The Washington Heights/Inwood Mobile Market is held between Nagle Avenue and 10th Avenue on Dyckman Street
- Arrive early for the best chance of receiving food
- Usually fresh produce

properties.name: City Harvest Mobile Market, Stapleton Houses
properties.notes:
- Go there early to get a good spot on the line
- Open to anyone within Staten Island
- ID is strongly encouraged
- Available Fresh Produce, but nothing specifically halal or kosher
properties.hours:
Tu 09:30AM-11:30AM "First Tuesday of the month"
Sa 09:30AM-11:30AM "Third Saturday of the month"

properties.name: City Harvest Mobile Market, Bed-Stuy
properties.notes:
- Pantry held at the Handball Court of the Tompkins Houses on Myrtle Ave (between Throop and Tompkins Avenues)
- must be a Brooklyn resident to be eligible to participate

properties.name: City Harvest Mobile Market, St. Mary's Park
properties.notes: - The St. Maryâ€™s Mobile Markets are held in the parking lot adjacent to 595 Trinity Avenue
